nes.
When he heard the cry, Oh, die you, not at all,
Oh, die you, not at all, Oh, die you, not at all,
He is the Lord.
And we stand now, let's all sing.
O come, all ye faithful,
Joyful and triumphant,
O come ye, O come ye to heaven.
O come, and be all ye,
For the King of angels.
O come, let us adore him.
O come, let us adore him.
O come, let us adore him, Christ the Lord.
And the last verse on the next day,
Oh, die you, not at all,
Oh, die you, not at all,
Oh, die you, not at all,
Oh, die you, die you,
He is the Lord.
And the last verse on the next day,
Oh, die you, not at all,
Oh, die you, not at all,
Oh, die you, not at all,
Oh, die you, die you,
He is the Lord.
